author: @omnitunes69
text: LetsEncrypt changed name to Certbot, check docs here: https://github.com/certbot/certbot , or https://certbot.eff.org/ .   Installation instructions are easier and better :   https://certbot.eff.org/#ubuntuxenial-apache  sudo apt-get install python-letsencrypt-apache   Though there are some caveats, not sure if it will affect my server and apache config so Im avoiding it for now, as Im devving locally.
